1648110.name: Automobilista 2 - Racin´ USA Expansion Pack
1648110.description:
The Racin´ USA Expansion Pack introduces some of the most iconic North American race tracks and cars from series like IMSA and Indycar to Automobilista 2.

This DLC combines all 3 parts of the original Expansion Pack plus the Bonus Expansion Pack released in December 2025, for a total of 10 unique venues and a collection of GTs, formulas, stock cars & sport prototypes.

Part 1 includes:

TRACKS

Daytona International Speedway

Weathertech Laguna Seca Raceway

Acura Grand Prix of Long Beach

VEHICLES

2020 DPi Class (featuring Cadillac DPi-V.R)

2020 GTE Class (featuring BMW M8, Corvette C8.R and Porsche 991 RSR)

Part 2 includes:

TRACKS

Cleveland Burke Lakefront

Watkins Glen International

Road America

VEHICLES

Formula USA Gen1 featuring Reynard 95i & Lola T95

Formula USA Gen2 featuring Reynard 98i, Swift 009c & Lola T98

Formula USA Gen3 featuring Reynard 2Ki & Lola B2K/00

Part 3 includes:

TRACKS

Indianapolis Motor Speedway

Auto Club Speedway

World Wide Technology Raceway

VEHICLES

Formula USA 2023

Bonus Pack includes:

TRACK

Pocono Raceway

VEHICLES

Stock USA Gen1

Stock USA Gen2

Stock USA Gen3

Stock USA Gen3 LM
1648110.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
